benchmark_details.name: LLMFusionBench
benchmark_details.overview: LLMFusionBench is a large-scale benchmark for LLM fusion that spans 14 tasks across five domains, providing responses from 20 open-source LLMs (8Bâ€“671B) totaling 103M tokens, enabling comprehensive studies on LLM fusion.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To support comprehensive studies on the fusion of large language models (LLMs) using multi-LLM log data.

data.source: Data from 20 open-source LLMs generating responses across 14 tasks.
data.annotation: Responses gathered from LLMs using distinct prompts for both direct and reasoning-based outputs.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on performance evaluation across various tasks using specific task metrics.
methodology.interpretation: A higher LLM Judge Score indicates more informative answers, while accuracy reflects the correctness based on ground truth.
methodology.validation: Validation through comprehensive analysis of responses from varied model sizes and evaluation against ground truths.
